patthana23.10:4.1: Nakusalaṃ nasekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.10:4.3: Hetuyā cha … pe … āsevane tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana23.10:5.1: Nakusalaṃ naasekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.10:6.1: Nakusalaṃ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.10:6.3: Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
